shortdesc.p: Spring Break is a week long break where students do not have school. To prepare for Spring Break there a few tasks that you need to complete.

I will be driving home for Spring Break to Chesterfield, Virginia. This drive normally takes 3 and 1/2 hours.In order to prepare for this drive, there are a few things that need to be done beforehand.

topic.title: How to Study for the LSAT

shortdesc.p: During Spring I will be studying for the LSAT, so you will be too.

topic.title: How to Buy a Sleeping Bag

shortdesc.p: You need to buy a sleeping bag to sleep on the floor because you will be staying in room.

topic.title: How to Set Up a Sleeping Bag

shortdesc.p: You will be sleeping on a sleeping bag on the floor in my room.
